sentence.Network_en: Husband and wife are now taxed separately on their incomes.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在夫妻双方分别按各自的收入纳税。

sentence.Network_en: Free gifts are dispatched separately so please allow 28 days for delivery.
sentence.Network_cn: 赠品会分开发送，所以请预留28天的送货期。

sentence.Network_en: With characteristic astuteness, he spoke separately to all those involved.
sentence.Network_cn: 凭着他特有的精明，他同有关人士一一进行了谈话。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 五星级酒店英语大全!_百度文库 ... straight 马上，立刻 separately 单独地 opposite 在...的对面.
分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分别〖 leaveeachother〗 分别〖 separately〗 分兵把守〖 divideupone'sforcesfordefence〗.
未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... separated a. 分开的 separately ad. 分别地 separator 分隔符.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S2) ... separate 分开的 separately 个别地 separateness 分开.

list.abs: 分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分局〖 suboffice;subbureau〗 分开〖 separate;divide〗 分科〖 departmentation〗.
-tion后缀 ... preparation 准备,预备 separation 分离,分开 celebration 庆祝(会),庆典.
中国特色词的译法 - Billwang 工业设计论坛 ... divorced 离异 separated 分居 number of children 子女人数.
有关环境污染的英语词汇 ... scrubbers 洗涤器 separators 分离器 smoke prevention 防烟.

entry.def: If people or things are dealt with separately or do something separately, they are dealt with or do something at different times or places, rather than together.

example.ex: Cook each vegetable separately until just tender...
example.tran: 每样蔬菜都单独烹调，煮到稍稍变软就好。

example.ex: Chris had insisted that we went separately to the club.
example.tran: 克里斯坚持我们不要一块儿去俱乐部。

sentences.sentence: "taken individually, the rooms were, in fact, square"

auth_sentence.content: Pour the dressing into a jug and serve separately.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pour the dressing into a jug and serve separately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pour the dressing into a jug and serve separately.

auth_sentence.content: Three letters of reference should also be sent separately.
auth_sentence.res_content: Three letters of reference should also be sent separately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three letters of reference should also be sent separately.

auth_sentence.content: Separately, California has set many a social trend.
auth_sentence.res_content: Separately, California has set many a social trend.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Separately, California has set many a social trend.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =bring birth,表示"生产,生出小孩"; 2. =come in sight,表示"看见;出现"; 3. =get ready,表示"准备;安置"; 4. =equal,表示"平等"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一胎多子的, 经产的, 非初产的, [植]多产的
stems_affixes.word_buile: multi多+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→多生产的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 初产的, 初次分娩的
stems_affixes.word_buile: primi=prim第一,最初+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→adj.初产的, 初次分娩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 每次产一个卵的; 每胎生一子的
stems_affixes.word_buile: uni单一+par生产,生出小孩+ous……的→生出一个

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表面上的,貌似真实的;显然的,明明白白的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+par看见;出现+ent……的→一再能看见→显而易见
trans横穿+par看见;出现+ent……的→横穿过去看得一样清楚→透明的
in不+separable[adj.可分离的, 可分的]→adj.不能分的
se分离+par置+able……的→adj.可分离的, 可分的
se分离+par置+ate表形容词→adj.分开的, 分离的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un无+prepare准备+ed……的→adj.无准备的, 即席的, 尚未准备好的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可比较的, 比得上的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compare比较+able……的→adj.可比较的, 比得上的
compare比较+ative表形容词→adj.比较的, 相当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 奇数的,不成对的,不平等
stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+parity[n.同等;奇偶]→adj.奇数的,不成对的,不平等
non不,无+par平等+eil→无平等的→无与伦比的
apparent显然的+ly表副词→adv.显然地
separate分开+ly表副词→adv.个别地;分离地
comparative[adj.比较的, 相当的]+ly表副词→adv.比较地, 相当地
par生产,生出小孩+ent……人→n.父母,母亲;[n.]双亲;父母

stems_affixes.value_cn: 透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃
stems_affixes.word_buile: transparent[[adj.透明的]]→n.透明, 透明度, 幻灯片, 有图案的玻璃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 器械,器具,仪器;机构,组织
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap=ad+par准备;安置+atus表名词→准备好用的东西→设备
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
prepare准备+ation行为,过程→n.准备, 预备
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com一起+pari=par平等+son→一起平等→比较
dis不+parity同等→n.不同,差异
par平等→n.一对, 一双
par平等+ity表名词→n.同等;奇偶
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
par准备;安置+ade表名词→本为部队训练场[即准备打仗得地方],引申为排队游行
pre预先+par准备;安置+e→预先准备好
re再+pair=par准备;安置→重新准备好→修理
com共同+par平等+e→平等的放在一起→比较
dis不+par平等+age动词后缀→不平等对待→轻视

Sentence.sentence: living separately would be too costly
But you both need to know what you're doing, who's paying what into the joint account and how much you keep separately.
put their money together instead of keeping it separately

means.word_mean: 分离地;个别地,分别地, 单独地

sentences.en: He sold his birds separately to separate buyers.
sentences.cn: 他把他的鸟儿分别卖给不同的买主。

sentences.en: He bought the parts separately and assembled his own computer.
sentences.cn: 他一一买来部件,组装成自己的电脑。

sentences.en: If we don’t hang together we may all hang separately.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不团结起来,我们会被一个个地绞死。

sentences.en: It doesn’t matter much whether we go together or separately.
sentences.cn: 我们一起去还是分头去都可以。

sentences.en: Living separately from parents after marriage is all the mode.
sentences.cn: 现在非常流行婚后与父母分开住。

sentences.en: The collar comes off this shirt and can be washed separately.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫的领子可以拿下来分别洗。
